snippet.title: 1971 PROJECT HELIOS - Launch Trailer (PEGI)
snippet.description:
FEAR THE COLD

1971 Project Helios is coming on June 9th!

In a frozen world, eight characters have to join forces for a common cause: find an important scientist kidnapped by a massive stratocracy. Along their way they will have to avoid raider attacks, investigate military headquarters, and infiltrate into the territory of a dangerous anti-technological religious sect.

STEAM | https://store.steampowered.com/app/1186630/1971_PROJECT_HELIOS/
GOG | https://www.gog.com/game/1971_project_helios
NINTENDO SWITCH | https://www.nintendo.es/Juegos/Nintendo-Switch/1971-Project-Helios-1753217.html
PLAYSTATION 4 | Soon!
XBOX ONE | Soon!
